Mayor & City Council
====================

A MESSAGE FROM THE MAYOR

[2024](http://www.cityofcuero.com/DocumentCenter/View/3631/A-Message-From-the-Mayor-2024)

[2023](http://www.cityofcuero.com/DocumentCenter/View/3630/A-Message-From-the-Mayor-2023)

Overview
--------

The [Home Rule Charter](http://www.cityofcuero.com/index.aspx?NID=184) of the City of Cuero revised in 2014.

City Council Meetings
---------------------

* Second Monday of every month
* 5:00 p.m.
* City Council Chamber in City Hall  
  212 E Main St.  
  Cuero, TX 77954
* A written request to appear before the council must be submitted by the second Friday of the month prior to the meeting. Submit requests to the [City Secretary](http://www.cityofcuero.com/index.aspx?nid=65).
* City Hall is wheelchair-accessible and accessible parking spaces are available. Requests for accommodations and/or interpretive services must be made 48 hours prior to meeting.
* Contact [City Administration fo](http://www.cityofcuero.com/index.aspx?NID=218)r further information.  
  Phone: 361-275-3476  
  Fax: 361-275-6265

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

View [Agendas and Minutes of the City Council](http://www.cityofcuero.com/AgendaCenter/City-Council-Meetings-2).

Elections
---------

* Councilmembers in Districts 2 and 3 are elected every two years in even-numbered years.
* Councilmembers in Districts 1 and 4 and at-large councilmembers are elected every two years in odd-numbered years.
* Mayor is elected every two years in even-numbered years.
* Elections are held on the first Saturday in May of each year.
* Please use the [District Map](http://www.cityofcuero.com/DocumentCenter/View/3575/District-Map-2023) to determine your council district.
* Visit the [Elections Page](http://www.co.dewitt.tx.us/default.aspx?DeWitt_County/Elections).
